multicall.label: Use Multicall
multicall.tooltip1: Multicall batches several calls in the same blockchain transaction.
multicall.tooltip2: This saves time and gas, but if a call in the batch fails, all other calls will also fail.

delimiter.label: Rows delimiter
delimiter.tooltip: Character that separates one field from the next in the same row. 'Auto' option lets the application autodetect this.

table.title: Preview:
table.uploadedMessageFirst: Uploaded {count} rewards. Showing only the first {firstCount}:

batchRewards.title: Batch Rewards
batchRewards.usernameSearchFailed: There was an internal error searching for usernames
batchRewards.noWallets: Can not find a wallet for username {handle}
batchRewards.info: CSV file should have the following headers: user, token, amount, actionType, rewardId
batchRewards.infoList:
• user: Address or username of the user that will receive the tokens.
  • token: Addres or name of the token/badge to reward.
  • amount: Amount to reward.
  • actionType: Mint, Transfer or Badge.
  • rewardId: Reward Identifier, ex: first-post.
